book.title: Charlemagne
book.description: 简介： It was at Ingelheim[1] on the Rhine that Charlemagne usually established his court during the middle period of his reign. An obelisk upon one of the adjacent heights, erected in 1807, bears the inscription, Charlemagnes highway. The erection of his p...
